Species distribution models (SDM) AZTI 2022-05-12 Chapter 1 About This is a short tutorial for constructing species distribution models in R. It describes the whole process from downloading OBIS and GBIF data, generating pseudo-absence data, including environmental data, fitting the model, validating the model and generating the resulting maps for visualization. The code is available in the [https://github.com/Fundacion-AZTI/SDM] repository and the book is available in
